## Load library

```{r}
library(tidymodels)
```



## EDA

```{r}


iris %>%
    janitor::clean_names() %>%
    set_names(colnames(.) %>%
                  str_replace_all(., "_", " ") %>%
                  str_to_title()) %>%
    select_if(is.numeric) %>%
    gather() %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = value)) +
    facet_wrap(~ key, scales = "free", ncol = 4) +
    geom_histogram()

iris %>%
    janitor::clean_names() %>%
    set_names(colnames(.) %>%
                  str_replace_all(., "_", " ") %>%
                  str_to_title()) %>%
    select_if(is.factor) %>%
    gather() %>%
    ggplot(aes(x = value)) +
    geom_bar()

```



## split

```{r}
df  <- iris
set.seed(seed = 1972) 

train_test_split <-
    rsample::initial_split(
        data = df,     
        prop = 0.6   
    ) 

train_test_split

train_tbl <- train_test_split %>% training() 
test_tbl  <- train_test_split %>% testing() 
```

## recipes

```{r}
recipe_simple <- function(dataset) {
  recipe(Species ~ ., data = dataset ) %>%
    step_corr(all_predictors()) %>%
    step_center(all_predictors(), -all_outcomes()) %>%
    step_scale(all_predictors(), -all_outcomes()) %>%
    prep(dataset)
}

recipe_prepped <- recipe_simple(dataset = train_tbl)

train_baked <- bake(recipe_prepped, new_data = train_tbl)
test_baked  <- bake(recipe_prepped, new_data = test_tbl)

recipe_prepped
```

## Model Training

```{r}
iris_ranger <- 
  rand_forest(trees = 100, mode = "classification") %>%
  set_engine("ranger") %>%
  fit(Species ~ ., data = train_baked)
```

## Predictions

```{r}
iris_ranger %>%
  predict(test_baked) %>%
  bind_cols(test_baked) %>%
  glimpse()
```
## Model Validation

```{r}
iris_ranger %>%
  predict(test_baked) %>%
  bind_cols(test_baked) %>%
  metrics(truth = Species, estimate = .pred_class)
```

## Per classifier metrics

```{r}
iris_ranger %>%
  predict(test_baked, type = "prob") %>%
  bind_cols(test_baked) %>%
  roc_curve(Species, .pred_setosa:.pred_virginica) %>%
  autoplot()
```
